import { Environment, Lightformer, OrbitControls, PerspectiveCamera, CameraControls, Html } from "@react-three/drei"; import { useThree } from "@react-three/fiber"; const Stage = (props) => { const {camera} = useThree(); const zoomCamera = (event) => { camera.position.z += event.wheelDelta / 400; } window.addEventListener('wheel', zoomCamera); return( <> {props.configulater ? <> {/* Ceiling */} {/* Sides */}
